title: Solomon Builds the Temple
summary: Solomon begins building the temple in Jerusalem on Mount Moriah. The chapter details the dimensions and materials, including gold-covered walls and two large pillars named Jakin and Boaz.

faq.question: Where was the temple built?
faq.answer: On Mount Moriah in Jerusalem, the same place where Abraham prepared to sacrifice Isaac.
